entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rockglen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming a few clouds near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
